controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include systems and controls to verify that the partnership exists?
controls.detail-label: Describe the systems and controls used to verify partnership existence

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include systems and controls to verify that all partner names have been provided?
controls.detail-label: Describe the systems and controls used to verify partner name collection

controls.label: Does your procedure collect the full name of the partnership?
Does your procedure collect the full business name (if any) of the partnership as registered under State or Territory business names legislation?
Does your procedure collect the country in which the partnership was established?
Does your procedure collect KYC information about at least one partner in accordance with the individual identification procedure?
controls.detail-label: Explain which partner is selected and how individual KYC information is collected

controls.label: Does your procedure collect the full name and residential address of each partner, or verify regulated status through a professional association directory?
controls.detail-label: Explain how partner names and addresses are collected, or how professional association directories are used

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include risk-based systems and controls to determine whether additional KYC information beyond the minimum requirements should be collected?
controls.detail-label: Describe the risk-based criteria and decision-making process for determining additional collection

controls.label: Does your procedure verify the partnership name using partnership agreements, certified documents, or reliable independent sources?
controls.detail-label: Describe the verification methods used for partnership names

controls.label: Does your procedure verify information about at least one partner in accordance with the individual identification procedure?
controls.detail-label: Explain how individual partner information is verified

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include risk-based systems and controls to determine what additional KYC information collected should be verified?
controls.detail-label: Describe the risk-based criteria for determining extent of additional verification

controls.label: Does your procedure require verification based on partnership agreements, certified documents, reliable independent documents, or reliable independent electronic data?
controls.detail-label: List the specific verification sources and methods your procedure relies on

controls.label: Do you use disclosure certificates to verify partnership information where other sources are not reasonably available?
controls.detail-label: Describe the circumstances and process for using disclosure certificates

controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include risk-based systems and controls to respond to discrepancies in partnership verification?
controls.detail-label: Describe how discrepancies are identified, investigated, and resolved

groups.title: General CDD Obligation
groups.description: Risk-based systems and controls to verify partnership existence and completeness of partner information

groups.title: Collection of KYC Information
groups.description: Minimum KYC information to be collected about partnerships and their partners

groups.title: Verification of Information
groups.description: Minimum verification procedures for partnership names and partner information

groups.title: Additional KYC Assessment
groups.description: Risk-based systems and controls to determine collection and verification of information beyond minimum requirements

groups.title: Methods of Verification
groups.description: Acceptable sources and methods for verifying partnership information

groups.title: Disclosure Certificates
groups.description: Use of disclosure certificates as a verification method when other sources are not reasonably available

groups.title: Responding to Discrepancies
groups.description: Systems and controls for identifying and responding to discrepancies in partnership verification
